item.description:
As writers, we practice our craft in solitude, but that doesn't mean we're all alone! For this meetup, Grace's and Sharon's pieces will be in the Files page (under the More drop-down list on the home page). The pieces will be clearly marked and will be available for your to read by noon the Saturday before workshop. Please read and critique these pieces to be able to contribute to the meeting.

Interested in submitting a piece (fiction, non-fiction, memoir, poetry, etc.) for another workshop? Email Kate to be scheduled.
item.name: Boston Writer's Meetup: Workshop
